Headline: #66 Chicago Temporary Reroute at Chicago Avenue/Larabee
ShortDescription: 66 Chicago buses are rerouted via Chicago, Halsted, Division, Larabee and Chicago: due to, street blockage near Chicago Avenue/Larabee.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted via Chicago, Halsted, Division, Larabee and then will resume their normal route at Chicago: due to, street blockage near Chicago Avenue/Larabee.

Allow extra travel time.
